articles.title: OnePlus’ next big smartphone launch: What to expect and what not - Gadgets Now
articles.description: OnePlus has announced that it will be launching the third smartphone under the Nord series, within a month of launching the new OnePlus Nord CE 5G. Dubbed as the OnePlus Nord 2 5G, CEO Pete Lau has said that the smartphone will launch in India and Europe on J…
articles.content: If reports are to be believed, the new OnePlus Nord 2 5G may start at Rs 29,999. There may be three RAM + storage variants of the OnePlus Nord 2 5G covering the price points of up to Rs 36,000.
